comments:
I200411240800 + zrh-plugins from 20041126_1123

In an 1.4 java project, create an empty file X.java and open it.
Paste this string (without quotes):
"class A {
	List<String> useList(List<String> la) { }
}"

=> Command fails with AE below. Works when Smart Insert mode is off
